thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Mix of Modern and Historic
thread.title_full: A Mix of Modern and Historic - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: johnrm231
title: A Mix of Modern and Historic
text: Beautiful historic building, but has been updated and modernized. Comfy bed, clean room, super friendly and helpful staff. Try the restaurant too... everything here was great. Conveniently located to restaurants, shopping, and Tube station.
